inn1.comm: Whelan hits  good length straight away and the ball cuts back into van Wyk from just outside off stump, he plays it down to the off side
good length once again outside the off stump, van Wyk has a look and lets it go
fuller lngth and this time the ball angles into van Wyk who gets half forward and defends
good length once again on off stump, van Wyk pushes forward ,gets hit on the pad and they run a leg bye
short of a length outside off stump, AB de Villiers lifts his arms out of the way and lets it go
a touch fuller and the ball cuts into de Villiers who pushes forward, the ball hits the inside edge and goes towards square leg for a single
that's a wayward start, the ball moved a long way off the pitch and it was well down leg side, Niall O'Brien had no chance of saving that one, four wides
Fourie bowls the outswinger on a perfect length and has de Villiers pushing tentatively on the front foot, the ball beats the outside edge
once again the outswinger beats the bat
this time de Villiers takes a step down, gets to the pitch of the ball and drives it inside out through covers for the first boundary of the innings
defended on the off side
good length ball angling into middle and leg, de Villiers waits on the back foot and plays it to midwicket
pushed back to the bowler on the back foot
that's not the line to bowl when you've got two slips, Whelan fired that down leg side
full ball outside the off stump, van Wyk leans forward and drives through cover, the fielder gives chase, slides on the fence but his foot was touching the line as he pulled it in
that was pitched on a good length on off stump, van Wyk lets it go close to off stump
fullr ball on of stump, van Wyk tries to force it through the off side but gets an inside edge towards backward square leg
played off the pads towards midwicket for one
good length ball outside the off stump, played with soft hands towards cover for a single
that wasn't short at all on off stump, de Villiers latches on to the length and then pulls through midwicket for four
slower and looped up on off stump, played back to the bowler
back of a length outside off stump, no pace at all, cut tamely to backward point
back of a length going down leg stump, he shuffles across and looks to work it fine but misses out
good length on off stump, he falls over trying to work it to the on side
half volley outside off stump, firmly dispatched through the covers
back of a length on off stump, he shuffles and works it straight to square leg
short of a length drifting down leg stump, de Villiers goes for the tickle but misses
short outside off stump and in jiffy de Villiers just swivels and swats it over midwicket for a sumptious four
good length outside off stump this time, he gets well forward and shoulders arms
overpitched on off stump, he on-drives, twirling the bat in his hands, to the man at midwicket
short and wide, stays low, de Villiers looks to cut but loses balance as the ball gets an under-edge off the bat
short of a length and seaming away outside off stump, de Villiers leaves it be
good length outside off stump, he comes well forward to defend but the ball clips his front pad, but outside the line of impact
short and wide, theres that uneven bounce again as the ball stays low, and van Wyk cant time his cut past Porterfield at backward point
fuller outside off stump, he lunges forward and pushes to cover
quicker, seaming away outside off stump, left alone
another good length delivery outside off stump, left alone
good ball, great length outside off stump, drawing him forward and shaving past his bat
fuller on middle and off, turned straight to square leg
a tad fuller outside off stump, he gets onto the front foot and defends it down to point
short outside off stump, he swivels and pulls into the ground, but does find the gap so he gets three
short and wide, cut hard past backward point out to the man in the deep
back of a length, comes in off the seam, defended on the hop
good yorker on off stump, he plays it softly into the covers
back of a length, swings in quickly and goes for the cut, gets a thin edge but the ball pops up slowly and lands well in front of the 'keeper
slow and looping up on off stump, he squeezes the drive into the point region
good length outside off stump, comes forward and defends back to the bowler
short again and he just stands and pulls that, off the front, through midwicket
short of a length, awkward bounce, he shuffles and defends it back
short and very wide, he reaches out and runs it off the face of the bat to third man
back of a length on off stump, he gets behind it and taps it to mid-on
good length outside off stump, left alone
short ball on off stump, van Wyk goes for the pull but takes his eyes off the ball and gets smacked on the grill of the helmet
pitches on off and jags back into van Wky who plays half forward and gets hit on the top of the front pad outside the line of off stump
defended on the front foot to the off side
short of a length outside the off stump, van Wyk leans back and cuts down to third man for a single
fullr ball on leg stump, de Villiers leans forward but misses the flick, the ball hits him on the pad and they run a leg bye to midwicket
short of a length outside off, van Wyk plays it in front of point for a single to retain strike
good length ball angling into van Wyk who's caught on the crease, he defends awkwardly to the leg side
Fourie drifts on to leg and van Wyk clips it through square leg for one
that one stopped on de Villiers a touch, he went quickly on to the back foot and defends it back to  the bowler
whipped off the pads to deep backward square leg for a single
fuller ball on off stump, van Wyk waits for it in his crease and plays it late towards point
that was too close to cut and van Wyk was comprehensively beaten outside the off stump, he nearly lost the top of off stump but lives to cut again
left alone outside off stump
Whelan drifts on to middle and leg, de Villiers moves across and flicks it through midwicket
short and wide outside the off stump, van Wyk reaches out for it and cuts over slips for four more, a la Sehwag
good length ball on off and middle stump, van Wyk defends back to the bowler on the back foot
tight line and length around off stump, van Wky gets a stride in and defends to point
nimble use of the feet this time, van Wyk takes a quick step or two forward and towards leg, he uses the room he's created to play the square drive to perfection
he begins with a loosener - full and outside off stump - de Villiers quickly gets on to the front foot and laces it through cover
good length delivery outside off, de Villirs moves back and across and lets it go
that pitched on middle and off and moved a shade away from de Villiers who got squared up while defending towards the off side
a touch on the fuller side and de Villiers meets it with the full face of the bat and powers the straight drive past mid off for four more
edged past the wicketkeper Niall O'Brien, who's standing up to the stumps, to third man
played off the pads towards midwicket
driven off the front foot to cover
a touch on the fuller side, and de Villiers uses the middle and leg stump line to work it off his pads to backward square leg

that's the first wicket! de Villiers gave Whelan the charge and lofted him inside out over covers, he didn't time it well and Cusack, the debutant, ran in from the fence and took a well-judged tumbling catch
fullish ball on middle and leg stump, defended towards midwicket on the front foot
that was rather close to off stump but van Wyk moved quickly on to the back foot and cut it past backward point for a single
full ball on leg stump, Kallis moves across and tickles it down to fine leg to get off the mark
Kallis gets on to the front foot and drives a full ball firmly to mid off
worked off the pads to midwicket where Johnston does the fielding
shot, that was a fraction short outside the off stump, Kallis moved forward and drove it on the up through covers for four
cut down to third man on the back foot for a single
fuller ball on off and middle, van Wyk pushes it to mid on
short and wide outside the off stump, van Wyk jumps up and cuts in front of point where Porterfield dives to his right to cut off any runs
tossed up on off and middle stump, Kallis leans forward and across and closes the face to play it to square leg
flatter through the air this time, van Wyk moves back and flicks to square leg
fullr ball on off stump, Kallis comes forward and drives to long on
quicker ball on off stump, van Wyk gets on to the front foot and defends
slower and fuller outside the off stump, driven through cover on the front foot
shorter length outside off stump, van Wyk moves back and cuts past point
chopped down to the wicketkeeper from outside off stump
fuller ball on middle and leg, played off the pads to midwicket
good length ball on off stump, van Wyk moves back and plays it with soft hands on the off side for  a single
Kallis comes forward and tries to flick, he misses and gets hit on the pad and the ball rolls away to the off side
Kallis takes a step down to met a good length ball on off stump on the bounce, he times the off drive well but hits it to the man at mid off
good length on off and middle, Kallis moves across and flicks through square leg
flicked off the pads behind square leg for a single
tossed up on off stump, van Wyk pulls the reverse sweep out of the hat but short third man runs across and does the fielding
van Wyk tries to cut through point but gets a bottom edge on the off side
cut past backward point for two more
that was the straighter one, van Wyk played for turn and the ball beat the outside edge
shorter in length outside the off stump, van Wyk moves back in his crease and cuts past point
pushed with soft hands on the off side for a single
good length outside the off stump, Kallis planst his foot forward and drives away from his body behind point for a single
that pitched on a good length and jagged back into van Wyk who was beaten for pace and bounce and got hit on the thigh
defended on the back foot to the leg side
short and wide outside the off stump, van Wyk makes a half-hearted attempt at stepping out of his crease and reaches out for it, the ball beats the bat
once again the ball that jags back into van Wyk from off stump beats him and hits him high on the thigh
tossed up on off stump, driven on the front foot to long off
flatter ball on off stump, van Wyk goes back and cuts to cusack on the cover fence
defended on the back foot towards midwicket
Pulled away to deep midwicket for one more
Flicked off the pads to square leg
Defended on the front foot to the leg side
driven to long on off the front foot to bring up the 100 for South Africa
short ball outside the off stump, van Wyk cuts it behind point for a single
full ball that nearly swung back into Kallis's blockhole, Kallis moved foward and played a whippy flick towards midwicket
good length ball outside off, Kallis gets on to the front foot and drives through cover
van Wyk movs forward and drives the ball once again through covers for a single
full length on off and middle, Kallis comes forward and across and drives to long on
tossed up on off and middle , Kallis moves forward, doesn't get to the pitch of the ball but drives to long on for a single
played off the pads behind square
cut off the back foot to short third man
cheeky cheeky, van Wyk tried to play a cute cut short to one that was on off stump, he got an inside edge to the leg side
defended to the off side
McCallan finishes an excellent over with a good length ball on off and middle, van Wyk gets forward and defends towards midwicket
short of a length outside off stump, Kallis moves on to the front foot and throws his bat hard at it, the ball flies through point for two
full toss on off and middle, Kallis walks across and drives to long on

good length ball outside the off stump, van Wyk stays rooted to his crease and throws his bat at it, trying to whack it through the off side, the ball beats the bat and Johnston appeals for the caught behind
Johnston drifts on to leg and you can't do that when fine leg is in the circle, van Wyk flicks it past him and gets an easy four to the fine-leg fence
driven to the man on the cover fence for a single
good length ball on off and middle, played towards midwicket
short and wide outside the off stump, cut off the back foot to deep cover
defended back to the bowler on the back foot

Kallis takes a step down the pitch and gets under one from White, he lofts it high and far towards deep midwicket, the ball hit the bottom part of the bat and got more height than distance, the shot fell safely between two fielders just inside the ropes
paddled around the corner to back ward square leg for one
driven to long on for one more to finish the over
that one rose sharply from a good pength and beat Kallis, who tried to drive through covers
short and wide out side off stump, this time Kallis cuts to deep point for a single
defended to covers on the front foot
driven to the man on the cover fence for a single
pushed towards long on for another single
fuller ball outside off stump, driven on the front foot to deep cover
van Wyk stps down the pitch to White and clips him through square leg for two more
short and wide outside off stump, van Wyk cuts off the back foot to sweeper cover, that's his first ODI fifty, off 81 balls, well played!
driven to long off for another single
Kallis gives White the charge, gets under the ball and this time lofts him high and far over the long-on fence, massive hit for six
played through midwicket for one more
defended to midwicket on the front foot
short of a length on off stump, Kallis backs away to make room and drives through cover for one

that's the end of van Wyk, the ball was on a good length on off and middle, van Wyk moved a shade across and tried to chip it over midwicket, he didn't time it well and therefore didn't get enough elevation, Johnston took an easy catch at head height at midwicket
pushed towards cover for a single to get off the mark
good length ball just outside the off stump, Kallis tries to blast it through cover but misses
Kallis drives hard and straight back at Cusack who moves to his right and bends low to field the ball with one hand
cut to deep backward point for a single
he starts off with a very wide ball outside off stump
Kallis once again tries to launch it through cover but misses, Niall O Brien whips off the bails but Kallis was safe
Kallis gets a bottom edge as he tries to force it through the off side, he gets an edge down to third man
Gibbs tries to loft one over the leg side but ends up mis-hitting it between mid-on and long-on
a fraction short on middle stump, Kallis swivels and pulls it away to the deep backward square leg fence
Kallis stands his ground and drives a good length ball hard at cover where a mis-field allows the single
good length ball angling into Kallis's middle and leg stump, he moves his front foot out of the way and tries to heave it over midwicket but misses and gets hit on the thigh
Gibbs tries to pull but can't beat midwicket
a fraction short outside off stump, Gibbs moves forward and tries to pull it through midwicket, the ball takes the top edge and Niall O'Brien, standing up to the stumps, takes a smart catch
edged behind square on the leg side for a single
Kallis tries to heave it over midwicket once again but doesn't make proper contact
good length ball on off stump, Kemp plays it late and opens the face to run it down to third man
defended on the front foot back to the bowler.
in the blockhole on off stump, dug out back to the bowler
Kemp doesn't have much of a clue as to what's happening, he tried to force that through midwicket but was cramped for room as he came forward
whipped off the pads through square leg for a single
take that says Kemp, who charges down the track and unleashes a fierce cover drive that races to the fence
Kemp takes a step down again and lofts in the direction of midwicket, the ball falls to the left of the man in the ring and they run two more
short of a length on off and middle, Kallis pulls down to long on for one
cut in front of point for one more
Kallis pulls once again, this time to the right of midwicket for two more to the total

good length ball on off stump, it angles into Kallis who makes room for himself and tries to hit over the off side, he doesn't time it well and ends up lofting it straight to Kevin O'Brien at long off
good length once again on off stump, Kemp doesn't have room for the cut and he gets a bottom edge past the wicketkeeper for one
good length ball that cuts back into Boucher who plays back in his crease and gets hit on the pad
Kemp gives McCallan the charge and flicks him in the air just out of the reach of Johnston at midwicket
played off the pads for one more through midwicket
Boucher takes a step down to McCallan, realises that he isn't to the pitch of the ball and ends up whipping him off the pads through midwicket
Kemp gives him the charge once again and drives him to long on
fired in quick and fast on middle and leg stump, Boucher tries to hit him down the ground but gets an inside edge behind square on the leg side
tossed up on off and middle, Kemp takes two steps down the track and drives straight past the bowler, he's hit that so hard that long on has no chance to stop that

inn2.comm: he starts off with a wide one, that pitched outside off stump and moved even further away towards slips
this one's much closer to off stump, it pitched on middle and off and moved a shade away from the left-hander who pulled his bat inside the line off the ball
once again Porterfield lets one that is moving away from him go through to Boucher
this one is wider than the last two but certainly not as wide as the first ball, that's the first run for Ireland
this time Ntini bowls one wide down leg side, Ireland have their second run
a short ball hurries on to Porterfield who pulls the ball through square leg, he didn't time that very well but some shoddy fielding allows three runs
left alone outside the off stump
Ntini hits a good length outside off stump and angles it into Carroll who is caught on the crease and beaten
he's up to 140kmh straightaway, a full ball on off stump, Porterfield squeezes it out towards point
left alone outside the off stump, Boucher has to take it at chest height
full ball on leg and middle stump, Porterfield moves across his stumps and flicks it down to the fine leg fence for four, Steyn and Boucher appeal for leg before but Alem Dar signals runs
good length ball angling across the right hander from ovr the wicket, defended on the off side
Carroll had no idea what was going on thre, it was a quick ball on a good length on off stump, Carroll tirs to fend at it and ends up getting a thick outside edge that flies over cover
once again he's beaten for pace outside the off stump
Ntini gets one to bounce sharply from a good length and move away from Porterfield who lets the ball go
once again the ball angles away from Porterfield from a good length, he begins to play at it but pulls his bat out of the way in the end
Ntini strays down leg side and that's an easy decision for the umpire to make
Ntini pitches it on leg and middle, Porterfield flicks and flicks sweetly through square leg, they run like wildfire between the wickets for two
defended back to Ntini off the back foot
the length isn't short enough to pull and the ball hurries on to Porterfield who is late on the pull shot, he gets a top edge that flies over the slip cordon for four to third man
defended to point on the back foot
that's too full and too much on leg stump, Carroll clips it neatly off his pads to the square-leg fence
139 kmh, on a good length on off stump, Carroll movs back and across and defends to the off side
pushed towards midwicket for a quick single
this one pitches outside off stump and holds it's line through to Boucher after Porterfield decides to let it go
good length on off stump, Steyn is working up a brisk pace but Porterfield does well to get behind the line and defend solidly
pitches outside off stump and moves away from Porterfield who watches it through to Boucher
good length ball angling into Carroll from over the wicket, defended on the back foot back to Ntini
Carroll had neither the length or the room for the cut shot and was comprehensively beaten
Ntini fires one way down leg side and Mark 'Superman' Boucher flies to his left to pull off a one-handed save
edged past the slip cordon down to third man for a single
a rare loose shot from Porterfield, that pitched on off stump and angled towards slips but Porterfield tried to pull it across the line and was beaten
defended on the front foot towards midwicket
that rose steeply off a good length and beat the outside edge of Porterfield's bat as he attempted to punch it off the back foot
Steyn's got it up to 141 kmh, that was in the channel outside off stump, Carroll went back and across to try and cut it but was beaten for pace
fuller ball on middle and leg stump, Carroll moves across and gets hit on the pad behind square for two leg byes
played through point, it was more of an outside edge really but Ireland will take them in any manner
pitches on off and middle and angles into Carroll who moves across and gets hit on the pad, the South Africans appeal confidently but that was just missing leg
once more Carroll gets an outside edge down to third man and he sprints back for the second run, excellent running between the wickets
fuller ball on the pads, Carroll flicks behind square for two more to end the over
Ntini's struggling a touch with this right and left hand combination, this one was sprayed down leg side once again
good length ball pitching on off and moving away from Porterfield who tries to drive through cover but gets beaten by the bounce
Porterfield tries to pull the ball even though it's not that short at all, he gets hit on the thigh
excellent length, pitching on off stump and moving a shade away from Porterfield who pushes forward in defence and gets beaten
shorter length on middle stump, flicked off the pads through midwicket for one
Once again, Carroll gets an outside edge between second slip and gully; he collects a single to third man
this one cut back into the left hander, instead of moving away, after pitching outside off stump, Porterfield was beaten and Boucher dove to his right to make an excellent save
fullish length from Steyn, Carroll drives it right back at him, he really should have stopped that but only takes the pace off it as the batsmen run two towards long on
Steyn tests Carroll with a bouncer, the batsman ducks under it
short of a length ball on off stump, Carroll moves on to the back foot and defends on the off side
Steyn overpitches on leg stump and Carroll flicks it into the gap at midwicket, he hasn't timed it well enough to reach the fence but will pick up three
pitches outside off stump and angles away from Porterfield who lets it go
once again Porterfield tries to pull one that isn't short enough, the ball hurries on to him and hits him on the thigh and they manage to scamper a leg bye
starts with one on a good length on off stump, played to point
played off the pads behind square for a single
good length on off stump once again, Carroll opens the face and plays it to point
Carroll moves on to the back foot and closes the face to play it to square leg, Gibbs sprints it, picks up and fires at the non-striker's end, had he it, Carroll would have been in trouble
defended on the front foot but the ball hits the inside edge and goes towards square leg
full ball pitches outside leg stump and hits Porterfield on the pad

would you believe it, he's hit his wickets! Carroll went right back in his crease to defend a short of a length ball from Steyn, as his right leg came down, his foot slipped and caused him to fall over and hit his stumps with his back leg, I don't think his spikes were doing their job, an unfortunate way to go
he gets a nasty one first up, it rose off a good length and rapped him on the gloves
played with soft hands on the off side for a single
a fraction short and Porterfield was in no position to play the pull, his head fell over and he took his eyes off the ball as it hurried on to him, luckily for him the ball fell safely behind square
that's the second wicket of the over, Fourie fends at one away from his body and edges it to Kemp at first slip who takes a regulation catch
full ball on middle and leg, defended to midwicket on the front foot
good length outside off stump, defended to point
good length again, he gets the front leg out and defends to cover this time

edged and gone, and Philander gets his first ODI wicket on his 22nd birthday! The ball sat up from a short length and surprised Porterfield, who hopped up and fended, only to edge into Boucher's leaping gloves behind the stumps
good length, angled across the stumps and its left alone cautiously
bouncer goes all wrong, pitching outside leg stump and swinging away some
full on leg stump and he gets off the mark with a neat little flick past square leg, raising the 50 in the process
back of a length, pitching on middle and leg and seaming away, he pokes at it and gets a thick edge along the ground to third man
good length ball on middle and off stump, pushed on the front foot to mid off for a single
left alone outside the off stump by Joyce
Kallis is sending them down at 138kmh, that one pitched just outside off stump and Joyce chose to let it go even though it was rather close to off
short and wide outside off stump, Joyce tries to cut but gets beaten by the bounce
too full outside the off stump, in the slot for the drive and Joyce cashes in by leaning on to the front foot and dispatching it through covers
good comeback from Kallis, pitches it just short of a length and gets it to rise sharply on Joyce who gets beaten
Philander is having an excellent debut, Niall O' Brien plays all around one that swung back into him from outside off and hits off and middle stump, Ireland are really struggling now
loud appeal for leg before is turned down, that one jagged back into the right hander and hit him too high on the pad
ouch, Philander bangs one in short and Cusaack wears it on the rib cage
good length ball swings away from Cusack after pitching outside off
Philander is swinging both ways, this one cuts back into Cusack got plays it from his crease and gets hit on the thigh
short of  alength outside off stump, Cusack is beaten once again
on a good length outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
Kallis gets one to bounce sharply from a good length, Joyce once again lets it go
short of a length outside the off stump, Joyce stands on his toes, gets on top of the bounce and drives to cover
fuller ball on leg stump, Joyce moves across and tries to flick but gets hit on the pad, the ball runs down to fine leg
too full and too much on leg stump, Joyce flicks it off the pads through midwicket, Duminy gives chase but fails to pull it in with a last-second dive
full ball nearly in the blockhole on off and middle stump, Joyce punches it past the bowler on the front foot
Philander bangs it in short on middle and leg stump, Joyce moves back and across and fends it to square leg
good length ball on off stump, Joyce gets a stride in and drives towards cover
that was the slower ball on off stump, Joyce negotiated it well by getting forward and pushing it to point
Philander digs one short and Joyce is forced to let it go because of the steep bounce
played down to third man for a single
fullr length, homing in on off stump, Cusack gets half forward and defends on the frotn foot, it wasn't convincing
short of a length ball on off and middle, Joyce moves across and tucks it behind square on the leg side
defended towards point on the back foot
Cusack gets hit on the thigh by one that pitches on off stump and angles into him, he should have been playing forward to that one but chose to stay back in his crease
Cusack cuts to AB de Villiers at point on the back foot, he shies at the stumps at the non-striker's end and concedes an overthrow

pitches on a good length outside off stump and holds it's line, Joyce tries to drive off the back foot and ends up playing away from his body, the ball hits the outside edge and Boucher takes a low catch, Ireland have lost their fifth wicket
fullish delivery angling towards off stump, Kevin moves back in his crease and defends on the off side
tossed up on middle and leg stump, the batsman takes a step out and flicks through midwicket for one
whoops, he tossed that up too much, it finished as a high full toss which Kevin could have hit anywhere, he ends up hitting it to mid off
another full toss and Kevin drives to long on for a single
Tshabalala bowls this much flatter on middle and leg stump, Cusack waits on the back foot and pulls to square leg
Tshabalala drifts down leg side this time, worked off the pads towards short fine leg
another full toss and this time Kevin latches on to it and pulls it to the midwicket fence, Tshabalala was asking for that
short of a length delivery outside the off stump, Cusack tries to cut but misses
Kallis hits a good length and slants it into the right-hander, Cusack is caught on the crease and gets an inside edge towards the leg side
defended on the back foot towards point
short of a length ball on off stump, played off the back foot in front of point for one
this one is fuller from Kallis, Cusack waits for it and plays it late down to Ntini at third man for two more
pushed off the back foot to de Villiers at point

Tshabalala picks up his first ODI wicket on debut, Kevin O'Brien gave him the charge but didn't get to the pitch of the ball, he tried to heave it over midwicket but ended up scooping it straight to Morne van Wyk who took the catch a fair distance from the boundary
driven to long-on off the front foot for one
paddled around the corner for a quickly-run double
strays on to the pads this time, flicked through square leg for one
dropped, well in theory at least, Tshabalala bowled another full toss and Cusack whacked it back at him, Tshabalala stretched out his left hand and tried to take it one-handed but it didn't stick
driven down to long on for a single
he too begins with a  full toss, driven to deep coveer on the front foot
defended on the front foot back to the bowler

caught, oops ...and caught! White tries to reverse sweep Duminy but hits it straight to Ntini at short third man who fumbles it once but takes it safely on the second attempt, Duminy strikes with his third ball
he's off the mark first ball with a single to point
played with an open face to Ntini at short third man
Duminy strays on to leg stump, Cusack leans forward and defends to square leg
good length ball on off stump, Johnston gets forward and defends to cover
edged wide of first slip for a single to third man
good length once again from Ntini, the ball pitches on off stump and angles into Cusack who waits for it and opens the face late to run it down to third man
on the shorter side from Ntini and Johnston pulls it to deep square leg
fuller ball on off stump, Cusack moves forward and defends to point
excellent placement, Cusack moved across his stumps and nudged it into the gap between gully and point for two to end the over
beaten outside the off stump
Duminy bowls it flat and fast on off stump, Johnston drives it back at him
Johnston tries to flick it through the leg side but gets an edge on to the off side
pulled away towards wide long-on for two more
fuller ball and Johnston comes forward and lofts Duminy back over his head
Duminy immeaditely bowles a flatter one which Johnston pulls away to deep square leg
full delivery on middle and leg stump, Ntini was searching for the yorker that time, flicked off the pads through midwicket
full once again from Ntini, on off stump, Johnston drives on the front foot to mid-off
defended to cover on the front foot, there's no room for Johnston to work with

Duminy takes an outstanding catch! Johnston had to step on it and he tried slogging Ntini down the ground, he ended up slicing it high but straight past the bowler, Duminy covered a lot of ground, running to his left from long on and took an excellent sliding catch
full ball outside off stump, Cusack drives at it but gets beaten
Ntini strays on to the pads and Cusack moves across and tries to flick, he misses but the ball hits the pad for leg byes to fine leg
dabbed with soft hands towards cover for a quick run
Cusack takes on Tshabalala with success, he steps down the pitch and lofts him confidently over mid-off for four
driven past point on the back foot
tossed up on off stump, McCallan gets down on one knee and sweeps Tshabalala past short fine leg
driven hard and straight back at Tshabalala who doesn't manage to stop it, he deflects it to long off and the batsmen run a single
McCallan tries to reverse sweep and the ball hits the top edge and knocks him on the visor of the helmet
Kallis hits the pitch hard and gets it to bounce sharply from a good length, Cusack gets an inside edge that rolls behind him on the leg side
defended to point on the front foot
Cusack tries to cut one from just outside off stump, he gets cramped for room and the ball beats the bat
played down to third man for a single
defended on the back foot on the off side
McCallan leans forward and tries to drive through the off side, he gets a thick outside edge that runs down to third man

caught, but Steyn steps over the line! Cusack lofts Tshabalala high and far down to long on where Steyn back-pedals and takes the catch inside the ropes but the momentum carries him backwards and over the line
played through square leg for a single
McCallan tries to sweep but gets a top edge that falls in no man's land between square leg and short fine leg
too short from Tshabalala, pulled to deep square leg for two more
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
short of a length outside th off stump, McCallan drives loosely at it and gets beaten
too straight from Kallis and McCallan plays it in front of midwicket for a single
Cusack tries to flick on the leg side but misses and gets him on the pad
defended on the front foot towards cover
cut off the back foot to Kemp at gully where a mis-field allows the batsmen to scamper through
tight line and length outside off stump, McCallan wafts at it but connects with air and nothing else
starts off at a gentle 132 kmh outside off stump, it's enough to beat Cusack though
this one swings away from Cusack after pitching on off stump, he tries to cut but gets beaten once again
this time Cusack quickly moves back and across and cuts past point for two more
Cusack throws his weight behind the shot that's aimed to clear the extra cover fence, however, he gets an outside edge that flies to third man on the bounce
McCallan chips Steyn unconvincingly in the air on the leg side
played off the back foot towards point
McCallan leans forward and drives him superbly through point, the ball's timed really well but Duminy is equally superb at saving the boundary with a well-timed dive
defended to point on the front foot
short ball outside the off stump, Cusack tries to get under it and cut it down to third man but fails to make contact
Cusack backs away, makes room and lofts over cover

Philander has his third! He banged it in short, McCallan went down on one knee and tried to scoop it over Boucher, he ended up getting a faint nick and Boucher moved quickly to his left to take the catch
flicked off the pads to deep square leg
full and fast, aimed at the base off middle and leg stump, Whelan moves forward and defends back to the bowler
Steyn bowls it shorter and gets it up to Whelan's gloves, he defends it down on the off side and looks rather uncomfortable out there
Whelan makes contact with a crude flat-batted swat to mid on
squeezed out to second slip on the bounce
and Whelan survives as the last ball whizzes past off stump
good length ball on off and middle stump, defended on the back foot towards cover point
on the fullr side from Philander, Cusack thumps it but can't beat the man at cover
pushed into the gap at cover for a single
how did that miss, that was unbelieveable close to off stump, it might have even clipped the edge of off stump but the bails stayed on, curiouser and curiouser
they didn't stay on this time, Whelan tries to slog across the line, he misses, Philander hits and collects his fourth wicket on debut, a fine effort from him
